title: Memoranda  of Understanding by the  Ministry of Primary Industries between the Bank of Agriculture and Agricultural Cooperatives (Thailand) and the Faculty of Agriculture of the Kasetsart University (Thailand)
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Daya Gamage, the Minister of Primary Industries,  to enter into two Agreements between the Ministry of Primary Industries and the Bank of Agriculture and Agriculture Cooperatives in Thailand  for capacity building and for knowledge and experience sharing in the areas of Agriculture, Micro Finance and Agricultural support and the Ministry of Primary Industries and the Kasetsart University (Thailand) for technology collaboration related to Value Addition of Agricultural products, was approved by the Cabinet.
